jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
● Generate and quantify insights into local markets, assisting in creating clear market growth strategies 
● Propose, drive and track effectiveness of business growth projects on an international scale 
● Track the results of experiments and initiatives against growth targets and OKRs 
● Gather good case practices, SOPs and sharing to promote cross-country learning amongst GoFood teams 
● Collaborate closely with other functional, product and other stakeholders on both international and local scale to drive growth ● Support and assist as required for each country to scale GoFood
jobsJson.description:
● Generate and quantify insights into local markets, assisting in creating clear market growth strategies
● Propose, drive and track effectiveness of business growth projects on an international scale
● Track the results of experiments and initiatives against growth targets and OKRs
● Gather good case practices, SOPs and sharing to promote cross-country learning amongst GoFood teams
● Collaborate closely with other functional, product and other stakeholders on both international and local scale to drive growth ● Support and assist as required for each country to scale GoFood
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Bachelor degree in Science / Information Technology / Management or related discipline required
  • 3+ years of experience in data analysis, reporting and/or consulting in an eCommerce or related field
  • 2+ years of experience in project management or related fields
  • Strong stakeholder management and presentation skills required
  • Excellent communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skills
  • Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced environment
  • Proficient in complex SQL queries, Excel for data presentation
  • Experience with BigQuery, Tableau, Metabase, visualization and reporting tools, data profiling analysis and transformation preferred
